sentences.en: Tofu and mushrooms have their own unique flavours.
sentences.cn: 豆腐和蘑菇有它们自己独特的风味。

sentences.en: You can order a melon duo, tofu salad and grilled royal trumpet mushrooms with polenta.
sentences.cn: 你可以要一份瓜盅，豆腐沙拉和皇家烤喇叭菇配玉米粥。

sentences.en: Mapo beancurd is made of tofu and bean-based sauce. It is often topped with minced meat, usually pork or beef.
sentences.cn: 麻婆豆腐由豆腐和豆瓣酱做成。它上面经常撒以碎肉，通常是猪肉或牛肉。
